name: Broken Wings [GGJ 2021 Entry]
description:
Broken Wings - A 2.5D Action Platformer created for Global Game Jam 2021.
The theme was "Lost and Found". 

Try and find your buddies and bring them to the escape portals to be rescued!
A special prize awaits if you find everyone - use your abilities to Jump, Dash, Wall Jump and Glide to find everyone and help them escape the predicaments they have found themselves in!


Who Made the Game?

The game was created by:
JDSherbert (All Code, Game Design, Audio, UI programming, Art Implementation)
Twitter: https://twitter.com/JDSherbert_
Github: https://github.com/JDSherbert
GGJ: https://globalgamejam.org/users/jdsherbert

Charlottezxz (All Art and Models, UI Images and Sprite Animations)
Twitter: https://twitter.com/charlottezxz
Itch: https://charlottezxz.itch.io/

The original upload can be found on the GGJ Website here:
https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/broken-wings-9

The source files for the project are available here:
https://github.com/JDSherbert/Broken-Wings
